namePlaceholder: Enter a name for this configuration
variablesDescription: You can use these variables in your topic and message templates:
userUsernameDesc: The username of the user using the resource
userIdDesc: The ID of the user using the resource
timestampDesc: The current timestamp in ISO format
createSuccessDetail: The MQTT configuration has been created successfully.
updateSuccessDetail: The MQTT configuration has been updated successfully.
createErrorDetail: There was an error creating the MQTT configuration. Please try again.
updateErrorDetail: There was an error updating the MQTT configuration. Please try again.
